caption: In this episode, he finally proposed a work request to her, asking her to leave his team. During the conversation, they talked about his past and her future. He also mentioned his brother and a secret plan named Appledore. Her decision to leave his team, him talking about his past and her future, his brother being brought up in the conversation, him mentioning a secret plan named Appledore, both of them busily discussing Appledore in a restaurant, him presenting a Christmas gift but asking her to leave, his brother constantly guessing the secrets of Appledore, and them continuing their discussion about Appledore in the elevator. She decides to leave his team, and he brings up his brother and a secret plan named Appledore.
